name: Periodic Profit And Loss Statement With Multi Cost Center
query:
SELECT
    AP.name AS Parent, 
    AC.name AS Child, 
    AL.name AS Child_Leaf,
    COALESCE(ALN.name, "") AS Leaf,
    SUM(GL.credit) - SUM(GL.debit) AS Amount
FROM 
    `tabAccount` AS AP
INNER JOIN 
    `tabAccount` AS AC ON AP.name = AC.parent_account
INNER JOIN 
    `tabAccount` AS AL ON AC.name = AL.parent_account
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabAccount` AS ALN ON AL.name = ALN.parent_account
INNER JOIN 
    `tabGL Entry` AS GL ON COALESCE(ALN.name, AL.name) = GL.account
WHERE 
    AP.name = "Income - KFPPL"
GROUP BY 
    AP.name, 
    AC.name, 
    AL.name, 
    COALESCE(ALN.name, AL.name);
report_name: Periodic Profit And Loss Statement With Multi Cost Center
